title: kAge kUgitalla
sahitya:
kAge kUgidalla Iga ondu kAge kUGidalla


caraNam 1    ellarELada munna gullu mADutaleddu cellida dhana dhAnyava melluta 
mallige muDiyavaru maredoragalu bEDi pullanAbhana pUje maiyavidendu
    caraNam 2    yAru Elada munna Oeante tAneddu kEri kEriyali sancarisuta 
Ore mOreya mUru kaDEge tirugisutta Urinda baruva neNTaru baruvuda hELva
    caraNam 3    pitrugaLa kAryakke agdyavAgOdu hatavAdavara kAngkSA tiLisuvudu 
ati hEya vastu I kAgeyenalu bEDi hitavAda shakunava nuDivudi kAge
    caraNam 4    kaSTava iSTavaniSTava sArutta shrSTi sampadava kai kUDisutta 
shrESTa brAhmaNara baliharaNava tindu paTTasAle mEle kUguva kAge
    caraNam 5    mangaLa mahimage mahalakSmiya rasage hingade mAnava prIyanige 
gangeya pita shrI purandara viTTalanna singArada pUje samayavendu
